0.text: Bug 108975  Visibility Toggle -  Chart Interactivity BPS 37.

1.text: This is a point feature of BPS37 (http://www.eclipse.org/birt/wiki/index.php?

2.text: n=BPS.BPS37)  This feature covers the ability to toggle the visibility of chart elements.

3.text: The SVG, SWT and Swing renderer should support this feature.

4.text: The following is a use case.

5.text: A line chart consisting of two datasets is displayed in an html page using the  SVG renderer.

6.text: The user has the ability to select a legend item to toggle the  visibility of the associated dataset in the plot area.
